mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.material_code AS product_code, m.material_name AS product_name, mc.category_name AS category, m.type, m.style, m.specification, m.unit, m.price, m.expected_delivery_days, m.description, m.status, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM material m LEFT JOIN material_category mc ON m.category_id = mc.id WHERE m.id = #{id}

SELECT m.id, m.material_code AS product_code, m.material_name AS product_name, mc.category_name AS category, m.type, m.style, m.specification, m.unit, m.price, m.expected_delivery_days, m.description, m.status, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM material m LEFT JOIN material_category mc ON m.category_id = mc.id WHERE m.material_code = #{productCode}

SELECT m.id, m.material_code AS product_code, m.material_name AS product_name, mc.category_name AS category, m.type, m.style, m.specification, m.unit, m.price, m.expected_delivery_days, m.description, m.status, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM material m LEFT JOIN material_category mc ON m.category_id = mc.id ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material (material_code, material_name, category_id, type, style, specification, unit, price, description, status) VALUES ( #{productCode}, #{productName}, COALESCE(#{categoryId}, (SELECT id FROM material_category WHERE category_name = #{category} LIMIT 1)), #{type}, #{style}, #{specification}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{description}, #{status} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE material
material_name = #{productName}, category_id = #{categoryId},
category_id = (SELECT id FROM material_category WHERE category_name = #{category} LIMIT 1),
type = #{type}, style = #{style}, specification = #{specification}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price}, expected_delivery_days = #{expectedDeliveryDays}, description = #{description}, status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id}
